issue.title: [CF 23] Holy Power
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

If it were possible to assign a counter for core Holy Power I feel tellmewhen would be just that much more useful and powerful.  Especially if you could assign icons to show when you only have a certain amount of power. For instance on my pally I would like to assign an icon for Templar's Verdict that will only appear when I have 3 Holy Power, there are current methods for other resource types where you can set boolean operators and I feel like Holy Power should be implemented there.  Also just the concept of a counter in general for a resource would be awesome, one of the strong points of tellmewhen is that I can look at it instead of searching all around my screen for information that is valuable to me.  I would love it if this was applied to all resources Holy Power, Mana, Combo Points, Focus, ect...

Please provide any additional information below.

You guys are amazing please keep this addon going it is by far the most useful one I have!

-Ex Dunemaul US
